item.description:
Hey folks, Nick here. I'm hoping to go over a basic Rails introduction for this next meeting and cover some my more Ruby syntax along the way.

I'll welcome any and all suggestions for more specifics topcs of discussion, and would love to hear how some of you folks are using Ruby in your work, hobbies, where ever.

If anyone has any contacts with in MESDA would you please let me know. I'm hoping to be able to get some small funding for this group so we can get things like food and such and hold more regular meetings. I've never done this before, so if anyone has any experince in setting things like this up feel free to lend a hand and some suggestions!

group.name: The Portland Maine Ruby Meetup Group

item.name: The Portland Maine Ruby January Meetup
